sentences.sentence: In the UK drinking water can contain no more than 100 micrograms of THM per litre. A microgram is one millionth of a gram.
sentences.translation: 在英国每升饮用水中三卤甲烷（THM）不允许超过 100 微克（ 一微克是一克的一百万之一）。

sentences.sentence: The more-widely used 25-microgram patch is prescribe mainly for lower-weight patients, children and patients just starting on the medicine.
sentences.translation: 处方使用的25微克剂型主要广泛应用于低体重患者，儿童和刚开始使用这种药物的患者。

sentences.sentence: A single 15 microgram dose of swine flu vaccine is enough for kids 10 and older, while children under 10 will need two doses, 21 days apart.
sentences.translation: 对于10岁和10岁以上的孩子们，单个15微克剂量的猪流感疫苗就足够了，而10岁以下的孩子们将需要二个剂量，间隔21天。
